svg.desc: Page template for a single page with a background panel that takes up half the page. The background panel is partially covered, used for atmosphere and should not contain any characters or objects. The six foreground panels are the main content of the page and can contain characters and objects. The six foreground panels are of equal width and height.

rect.data-info: half-page background panel for atmosphere; do not use characters objects as it is partially covered by further panels
1st panel; top row; first panel from the left
2nd panel; top row; second panel from the left
3rd panel; top row; third panel from the left
5th panel; bottom row; first panel from the left
6th panel; bottom row; second panel from the left
7th panel; bottom row; third panel from the left
